member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA
member.summary: TheGROUP_POLICY_OBJECT structure provides information about a GPO in a GPO list.

summary.para: Specifies link options. This member can be one of the following values.
This GPO is disabled.
Do not override the policy settings in this GPO with policy settings in a subsequent GPO.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.dwVersion
member.summary: Specifies the version number of the GPO.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.lpDSPath
member.summary: Pointer to a string that specifies the path to the directory service portion of the GPO.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.lpFileSysPath
member.summary: Pointer to a string that specifies the path to the file system portion of the GPO.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.lpDisplayName
member.summary: Pointer to the display name of the GPO.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.szGPOName
member.summary: Pointer to a string that specifies a unique name that identifies the GPO.

summary.para: Specifies the link information for the GPO. This member may be one of the following values.
No link information is available.
The GPO is linked to a computer (local or remote).
The GPO is linked to a site.
The GPO is linked to a domain.
The GPO is linked to an organizational unit.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.lParam
member.summary: User-supplied data.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.pNext
member.summary: Pointer to the next GPO in the list.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.pPrev
member.summary: Pointer to the previous GPO in the list.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.lpExtensions
member.summary: Extensions that have stored data in this GPO. The format is a string of GUIDs grouped in brackets. For more information, see the following Remarks section.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.lParam2
member.summary: User-supplied data.

member.name: GROUP_POLICY_OBJECTA.lpLink
member.summary: Path to the Active Directory site, domain, or organization unit to which this GPO is linked. If the GPO is linked to the local GPO, this member is "Local".
